allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement OBS WebRTC Source Plugin

Add WebRTC source plugin for receiving streams via WHEP protocol.
This implements Issue #12 with the following components:

- Core WebRTCSource class for stream reception
- OBS source plugin integration with obs_source_info
- Video texture rendering and audio output support
- Properties UI for connection settings
- Unit tests for source functionality

The implementation includes:
- src/source/webrtc-source.hpp: Core source interface
- src/source/webrtc-source.cpp: WHEP client integration
- src/source/obs-webrtc-source.hpp: OBS plugin registration
- src/source/obs-webrtc-source.cpp: OBS callbacks and rendering
- tests/unit/webrtc_source_test.cpp: Unit tests

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
